=== Can't connect to a wired network ===
Have a work through the <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=87644|Wired Ethernet Troubleshooting Process]]</nowiki>. This solves most common network problems. If you still have problems ask on the <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/|forums]]</nowiki>, make sure to say what you have tried so far.

=== Can't connect to a wireless network ===
Very good guide here <nowiki>[[WirelessTroubleshootingGuide]]</nowiki>
